errorMessages.text: File size should not be more than 1MB.
File size can not be less than 2KB.
Attachment can be only in PDF or DOC format.

welcomeMessage.MESSAGE1: Great to know that you are interested in exploring job opportunities with Elixir!
welcomeMessage.MESSAGE2: To make your recruitment journey seamless and personalized, our Recruiter Bot here will engage with you throughout, and make all the little things completely hassle-free.

welcomeMessage1.MESSAGE1: Great to know that you decided to continue your application process with Elixir!
welcomeMessage1.MESSAGE2: It is important that you upload your resume in order to avail all the features for a seamless and personalised recruitment journey. Our Recruiter Bot here will engage with you through out, and make all the little tasks completely hassle-free.
